entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 10:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: 10.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 9.8°C
Wind: SW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
